advancedSettings.fees.title: Colony pays my gas fees
advancedSettings.fees.description: Enable this to have the Metacolony cover your gas fees when performing actions on Colony. All you need to do is sign it. This is currently supported on select chains.
advancedSettings.fees.tooltip: Disabling this option means you will have to pay your own gas fees.
Colony will pay your gas fees on supported chains.
You will pay your own gas fees on all chains.

advancedSettings.rpc.description: If you prefer maximum decentralization, you may use your own custom endpoints for Colony

advancedSettings.delete.modal.title: We're sorry to see you go
advancedSettings.delete.modal.descriptio: Deleting your account means you could potentially lose funds and access to the following areas and account information on Colony. {br} {br} While you can delete your Colony account, you are not able to delete  content on chain. {br} {br} Deleting your Colony account is irreversible and you will need to recreate another Colony account.
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info2: You will lose your account settings
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info3: You will lose all of your Colony DAO subscriptions
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info4: You will lose your comment history
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info5: You will lose access to your username
advancedSettings.delete.modal.checkbox.l: I understand that deleted accounts aren't recoverable

advancedPage.recovery.description: If you believe that something dangerous is happening in your Colony (e.g. the Colony is under attack), recovery mode will disable the Colony and prevent further activity until the issue has been overcome.
advancedPage.recovery.notification: Note: Leaving recovery requires the approval of a majority of members holding the Recovery permission.

extensionDetailsPage.uninstallDescriptio: Uninstalling this extension will permanently delete all actions associated with this extension from this Colony. Ensure you understand the potential risks before continuing.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallBoxOne: All actions will disappear from the application and can never be recovered.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallBoxTwo: Please ensure that all funds in processes associated with this extension are claimed by their owners before uninstalling. Not doing so will result in permanent loss of the unclaimed funds.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallConfirmati: I understand that there is a risk of lost funds and past actions will disappear from the interface.
extensionDetailsPage.deprecateDescriptio: This extension must first be deprecated if you wish to uninstall it. After deprecation, any actions using this extension that are already underway may be completed, but it will no longer be possible to create new actions from this extension.

extensionDetailsPage.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to proceed?

actionSidebar.tooltip.streamingPayment.e: The end condition for the streaming payment, with the options: "When cancelled": Indefinite, will only end when it is cancelled. actionSidebar.tooltip.authority: Whether they have the authority to take actions on their own, or require others with the same multi-sig permission to approve as well.
permissions.custom.root.overview: Take actions effecting the Colony as a whole.
permissions.custom.root.tooltip: Root permission allows actions to be taken affecting the colony as a whole.
permissions.custom.administration.overvi: Create Advanced Payments and perform general mod tasks.
permissions.custom.administration.toolti: Administration permission allows you to create and manage Advanced Payments as well as general moderation actions.
permissions.custom.architecture.overview: Create teams and manage permissions in sub-teams.
permissions.custom.architecture.tooltip: Architecture permission allows you to create and manage teams within sub-teams.
permissions.custom.funding.overview: Fund expenditures and transfer funds between teams.
permissions.custom.funding.tooltip: Funding permission allows you to fund expenditures and transfer funds between teams.
permissions.custom.recovery.overview: Disable Colony, make updates and reactivate for emergencies.
permissions.custom.recovery.tooltip: Recovery permission allows you to disable Colony in emergency, update storage, and approve reactivation.
permissions.custom.arbitration.overview: Resolve disputes, make state changes and punish bad behavior.
permissions.custom.arbitration.tooltip: Arbitration permission allows you to resolve disputes, make state changes, and punish bad behavior.
actionSidebar.managePermissions.tableDes: Allows the member to take the following actions in this Colony:
actionSidebar.managePermissions.roleSele: Authority to perform general moderation tasks.
All Mod authorities as well as creating and executing any type of payment action.
All Payer authorities as well as additional admin actions such as creating teams.
Authority to perform all actions. Should only be given to highly trusted members or contracts.
Advanced permission control, allowing any combination of contract level permissions.
The ability to remove permissions from any address or contract in the selected team.
actionSidebar.managePermissions.permissi: Permission types determine executable actions. Permissions cascade down from parent teams, allowing top-level permissions to take the same action in sub-teams.
Permission types determine executable actions. Permissions cascade down from parent teams, allowing top-level permissions to take the same action in sub-teams.

Permissions can be assigned to any wallet or contract, enabling a Colony structure without individual control. Yet, assigning the 'Owner' permission to at least one address is vital. This role can be delegated to contracts, such as the 'Reputation’ Decision Method extension, enabling decentralized governance through Reputation.
Specific permissions that can be assigned:
Only available with individual permissions. Actions that can be performed:
All of the actions within Payer, plus:
All of the actions within Mod, plus:
All of the actions within Admin, plus:
actionSidebar.managePermissions.authorit: The Mod permission does not support multi-sig authority.

errors.delay.max: Claim delay must be less than or equal to {max} in {paymentIndex, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} payment.
errors.delay.min: Claim delay must be greater than or equal to {min} in {paymentIndex, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} payment.
errors.delay.emptyIndex: Claim delay can't be empty in {paymentIndex, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} payment.

errors.token.duplicateIndex: Duplicate token address in {tokenIndex, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} row.
errors.cantMoveToTheSameTeam: Cannot move to same team pot.
errors.sumOfPercentageMustBe100: The sum of percentages must be 100.
errors.reputation.smite.notEnoughPoints: Amount of reputation to remove is greater than the current reputation.
errors.recipient.required: Recipient is required in {paymentIndex, selectordinal, one {#st} two {#nd} few {#rd} other {#th}} payment.

colony.description: Add a description to your Colony to help others understand it's mission and purpose.
colony.tooltip.lockedToken: This token is locked. Colony native tokens are locked and non-transferrable by default to avoid unwanted project token transfer outside of the colony.
membersPage.contributing.title: Contributing members
membersPage.contributing.description: Members of the Colony with reputation and permissions
membersPage.allMembers.title: All members
membersPage.inviteMembers.description: Invite members to join and contribute to the Colony
decisionMethodSelect.title: Decision method
cancelModal.title: Cancel this payment
cancelModal.locked.title: Cancel the payment
cancelModal.description: This action cannot be undone. You will not be penalized for canceling the payment, any stakes made will be returned.
cancelModal.locked.description: To cancel, you will need to have Payer level or above permissions or use an available decision method.
cancelModal.permissionsDescription: This will use your Payer permissions to immediately cancel the payment and either return or penalize the creators stake.
cancelModal.toast.title: Payment cancelled
releaseModal.title: Release payment
releaseModal.description: To release funds, you must be the payment creator, have Admin or higher permission, or use an available decision method. This starts claim delays or triggers payment if there's no delay.
releaseModal.permissionsDescription: This will use your Payer permissions to immediately make the decision and release the payment.
useProfile.advancedTab.title: Advanced
advancedSettings.title: Advanced settings
fundingModal.title: Payment funding
fundingModal.description: To advance and fund this payment, you will need to have Payer level or above permissions or use an available decision method.
fundingModal.permissionsDescription: This will use your Payer permissions to immediately make the decision and fund the payment.
fileUploadModal.title: Upload CSV
fileUploadModal.description: Bulk upload recipients using a CSV. Use the template to ensure the correct structure, be sure to remove the sample data.
fileUploadModal.warningText: Uploading a CSV file now will replace all existing rows.
deleteAgreementDraftModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete this draft agreement?
deleteAgreementDraftModal.subtitle: The agreement will be deleted all content lost.
removeDraftModal.title: Remove draft and create a new agreement?
removeDraftModal.subtitle: You have an existing draft agreement already saved. Creating a new agreement will remove your existing draft.
teamsPage.empty.title: No results to display
teamsPage.empty.description: There are teams in the Colony that match your search. Try searching again
expenditure.createStage.label: Create
expenditure.cancelStage.label: Cancel
expenditure.reviewStage.label: Review
expenditure.reviewStage.tooltip: Payment is currently in review. The payment creator can make changes freely until details are confirmed.
expenditure.reviewStage.confirmDetails.i: If all details are correct, confirm the payment details to move onto funding. Changing after this point will require a governance process.
expenditure.fundingStage.label: Funding
expenditure.fundingStage.info: You need collective approval in order to fund the payment, click “Fund” to start the process.
expenditure.releaseStage.label: Release
expenditure.releaseStage.info: To allow recipients to claim their funds, you need to release them first. This will start the countdown on any claim delays as well.
expenditure.paymentStage.label: Payment
expenditure.paymentStage.info: You are now able to pay funds to recipients who have passed their claim delay.
